Title: Chapter One: And Let My Cry Come Unto Thee
Writer: Jeremy Slater (created by), Jeremy Slater (teleplay by), Jeremy Slater (television story by), William Peter Blatty (inspired by the novel by)
Actors: Alfonso Herrera, Ben Daniels, Hannah Kasulka, Brianne Howey
Plot: Angela Rance suspects a demonic presence has entered her home, and enlists the help of Father Tomas Ortega, who calls on experienced exorcist Father Marcus Keane.
